Uses of Interface
com.metsci.glimpse.event.touch.GlimpseGestureListener

Packages that use GlimpseGestureListener
com.metsci.glimpse.axis.listener.touch Provides classes used to update Axis1D and Axis2D instances in response to gesture events. 
com.metsci.glimpse.event.touch Glimpse specific listener classes allow Axis1D instances to respond to high level touch events (like pans, zooms, pinches, and swipes). 
com.metsci.glimpse.server.ios.server   
com.metsci.glimpse.server.render Encoding helpers for GlimpseTargetStacks, GlimpseLayouts, and touch events.

Classes in com.metsci.glimpse.axis.listener.touch that implement GlimpseGestureListener
 class AxisGestureListener
          A Glimpse gesture listener which defines the default way that axes are updated in response to high level gesture events (like those from a touch screen tablet device).
 class AxisGestureListener1D
           
 class AxisGestureListener2D
          An AxisGestureListener for use with GlimpseAxisLayout2D.
